comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
131 West 52nd Street had housed Club 18 before it became "House of Dixon." 
Monday, October 7, 1946, the Joe Mooney Quartet opened at Dixon's.
(“Hot Mooney Quartet 5-year WM Contract,” Billboard, October 5, 1946. 13).
The quartet stayed there until the end of March 1947.
("Goings on about Town," New Yorker,  March 29, 1947).
